alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 09 at 5:35PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CHST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Guam. * WHEN...Until 630 PM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 535 PM ChST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.8 to 1.8 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dededo, Tamuning, Yigo, Mangilao, Chalan Pago-Ordot, Barrigada, Yona, Hagatna Heights, Mongmong-Toto-Maite, Sinajana, Asan and Piti. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
